message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it brings.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $8,000 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This is a steal for a product you value at $10,000!

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $8,000 and $9,000, so I'll offer $8,500. I'm really interested in the product, and I think this is a fair price.
